bibl.title: Edited by R.M. HARRISON, A Byzantine Chapel at Marsa Matruh (Paraitonium).
bibl.note: The building, described in the published report as a "Byzantine Bath", seems more likely to have been a Byzantine chapel of unusual type. The architectural elements suggest a date in the sixth century rather than the fifth.
bibl.seg: GOODCHILD R.G. †, Edited by R.M. HARRISON, A Byzantine Chapel at Marsa Matruh (Paraitonium).
